An email extractor is usually a simple program or piece of software which is capable of extracting email addresses from various online document sources, including chat rooms, forums and mailing lists, as well as from email accounts maintained on servers.  

This Extension have the ability to perform both extraction and password recovery on documents and email accounts. They also allow users to determine the originating email address for any particular email.

You can buy the Pro or vip version if you are satisfied with the tool.

FEATURE 1: 

This tool is also useful in tracking down forgotten passwords of people and retrieving forgotten addresses of long lost friends. Online marketers use this to track down forgotten passwords of sites which they are promoting and extract the necessary information for online marketing campaigns. 

Many online marketers use it to find out the email addresses of leads which are not converting into sales. Online marketers use automated emails for direct email marketing, which is a lucrative method of promoting a business. These automated emails are sent to countless addresses for marketing purposes without any knowledge of whether the person receiving the email actually requested for the email or not.

FEATURE 2: 

Supports all kinds of formats and can be run on Windows, Mac OS X and Linux operating systems. Email finder tools are also helpful in scanning various kinds of documents and reports which include the following: document names, dates, authors, size, version, last modified time, URL, Subject Line, body of the email, keywords, and even check boxes and forms. 

All of these features make it easy for you to access the report that you need in a matter of minutes. Also includes various useful tools which includes a spider page creator, email address owner report, as well as password reset password. All of these features make it easy for anyone to manage large amounts of emails.

FEATURE 3: 

Best Email Extractor Extension is one of the most popular top tool in Internet Marketing. A reliable tool is an essential component of any online business as it helps in managing and organizing your ever growing inbox. This tool will help in saving a lot of time and prevent numerous emails from clogging up your inbox. It will help in organizing your contacts, tasks, campaigns, and products. Thus, an tool is the first and foremost tool which must be present in every Internet marketer's computer.

This extension commonly used to extract email address from messages sent on the internet, so that the user may use those emails for any purpose, to build a database of emails and send promotional campaign emails as well. 

Typically in the form of an online web application or downloadable piece of software and tools removes the need for manual collecting email addresses from the internet by automatically doing the task for a human. It also helps in managing large email databases efficiently, thereby reducing the time taken to search for the required information on the internet.

FEATURE 4: 

This technology has become more crucial in today's times as spam has become a major problem. Email account users are now finding it difficult to identify spams because the emails contain so many commonalities. These commonalities in style, content and even content formatting often fool the user and make it hard for him to distinguish a genuine email from a bogus one. 

Therefore, if the user finds a spam email, the first thing he does is to check whether the email is genuine or not. If it is a genuine spam then he may not be able to recognize it, but if it is a duplicate email, then he has to delete it without any further wasting time.

FEATURE 5: 

One of the common ways through which tool can be used is to remove duplicate emails found in online sources. By searching in search engines like Google and Yahoo this task becomes very easy because there are a number of online sources that provide free services to find out whether the email address is present on the internet.

If you do not want to spend money on hiring an internet investigator then you can rely on free online sources to get your hands on the details of email account owners. You just have to pay a little amount of fee to the service provider who will in turn give you the email details. Moreover, you can also check the history of these websites before trusting them with your email details.
